Managed a cross-functional team of 30 people including product managers, engineers, marketing managers, and designers.

Led the development of Chefing, an AI-based smart kitchen assistant that integrates meal planning, recipe discovery, inventory management and smart appliance connectivity. Managed a cross-functional team of 30 people including product managers, engineers, marketing managers, and designers. Implemented a comprehensive company strategy covering product development, marketing, team building, and fundraising. Achieved over 1 million app downloads and established strategic partnerships with major brands including GE, Bosch, Vorwerk, and LG. Raised $3.5 million in a venture round led by Bosch. Successfully brought innovation and enjoyment back to the kitchen through the Chefling app, available for free on the App Store and Google Play.
